channel.title: NPC NoClipping (317)
channel.description:
Hello,
I am running a 317 server and have a problem with the NPCs. If an NPC is free to roam anywhere, it can walk through walls and other obstacles, much like if a player were to do the command ::noclip. Not only is this a problem for random walking NPCs but also for summoned NPCs (Which follow the player, but walk through walls and other obstacles if necessary). I was wondering if there was a way to fix this? I apologise if this topic has arisen before.
Thanks, Shadowswoz.

item.title: NPC NoClipping (317)
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

Pretty much all servers have this problem, but it CAN be fixed. I was looking around yesterday and there are a few tutorials on here. Just search: “Clipping”, and you SHOULD find something. The actual way would be to do it through your client, but I am honestly not sure how this is done. I hope I helped.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC NoClipping (317)
